reviewText: I love at the zoo! My kids pick this one out a lot. Animals, and great integrity music!

This video does a very good job of connecting the scriptures with a real-life problem: Jonathan's not wanting to take care of his little brother and sister during the club's zoo outing (and similar attitudinal issues that come up!).  The Donut Man (Rob Evans) brings scripture and songs to bear on the problem in a creative and fun way, but, more importantly, a way that shows the solution in repenting, turning to Christ, and having faith for obedience.
